conversation_history.speaker: bot
conversation_history.message: Good morning! Welcome to our coffee shop. What can I get started for you today? We have some amazing seasonal drinks and fresh pastries!

conversation_history.speaker: user
conversation_history.message: Can I get a 4k and facebook?

conversation_history.speaker: bot
conversation_history.message: Oh, I think there might be a slight misunderstanding! We don't offer those services here. Perhaps you meant to order a drink? How about our signature Mocha or a classic latte?

improvement_suggestions: Use more professional terms like 'beverage' instead of 'drink'
Add 'Would you like' before suggestions to sound more professional
Use 'I recommend' instead of 'You should try'
Include 'Thank you for choosing us' in your responses
overall_assessment: Excellent communication with minimal errors. Great job!
